channel.title: [562]major drop issue[562]
channel.description:
I have a MAJOR issue with the drops in my 562 server. Every monster will only drop bones. Nothing else. Even if it has a 100% drop rate of AGS for example.
Base: RS2HD Source: Mezzyscape Type: 562 Loading 641
